entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 17. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Monday 16 May 2016
